dialogue: Mira quien está aquí. Martin, what are you doing here, in Baghdad!?
Sorry… Martin, Paco. He’s a Carmelite, like me.
Martha, let me present Bernardo and Paco. Martha is a brilliant journalist for the New York Times. They are the Carmelites I was telling you about.
Could you come just a tiny bit closer so I can get the impacts?
How long has it been since we last saw each other?
Five years… Do you remember Liberia?
I have some photos of you that we didn’t publish. If you give me an address, I can send them to you. Maybe to the embassy.
It is great to see you. Take care. Stay safe.
